channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 01:18 Alarm lifted in Mykolaiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 01:18 Alarm lifted in Mykolaiv region. Follow further messages. #Mykolaiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 22:32 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivska territorial community. Take cover!

item.title: 🔴 21:54 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
